quotes.quote: Parents know how to push your buttons because, hey, they sewed them on.
The good thing about having our buttons pushed is that we can no longer ignore the sensitive areas where we need to heal.
I don't push buttons to push buttons. Throwing the rebel card out there is really cheap.
It usually takes two people a little while to learn where the funny buttons are and testy buttons are.
I keep pushing buttons and trying to grow as a person and as a filmmaker.
Buttons are the fossils of the sartorial world, enduring long past the garments they were designed to hold together.
Never allow anyone to take you out of character, some people know which buttons to press.
I can't cut out a piece of cloth and make a lovely dress, but I can mend tears in shirts and sew on buttons.
Never hold anyone by the button, or the hand, in order to be heard out; for if people are unwilling to hear you, you had better hold your tongue than them
Photographers feel guilty that all they do for a living is press a button.
You may turn into an archangel, a fool, or a criminal - no one will see it. But when a button is missing - everyone sees that.
If the first button of one's coat is wrongly buttoned, all the rest will be crooked.
